original:
Astrobiological research explores the essential components required for planetary habitability, often relying on several foundational assumptions.


Carbon is the fourth most abundant element in the universe. Its unique chemical properties allow it to form stable yet reactive bonds, facilitating the creation of long and complex molecules. This characteristic leads to the presumption that the majority of life forms in the Milky Way galax
